item.title: An index theory for transverse trajectories
item.description: arXiv:2601.15651v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: In this work, we present an alternative definition of the Le Roux index, which generalizes the Poincar\'e-Hopf index for non-singular planar flows to the broader setting of Brouwer homeomorphisms. This new approach answers a question raised by Le Roux by establishing a connection between the index of a Brouwer homeomorphism and the structure of its transverse foliations, in the sense of Le Calvez.
item.dc:creator: Nelson Schuback
